sentences.cn: 你可能会被警察把车拖走。

sentences.en: The old system was complicated, whereas the new system is simple.
sentences.cn: 旧系统很复杂，而新系统很简单。

prefixIntro.imagery: Y 像分叉路，Z 像闪电。

sentences.en: Jimmy began to yield to her persuasion.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith appreciates your zeal for work.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生欣赏你的工作热情。

sentences.en: No one was more zealous than Neil in supporting the proposal.
sentences.cn: 在支持这项提议方面，没有人比尼尔更热情。
